name: Colleen Fogg
coverLetter: I have not trimmed before but I am an herbal medicine pharmacist with a strong work ethic, attention to detail, and ability to work quickly. I also possess an artistic eye.  I require onsite accommodations (tent space OK), meals included or nearby availability of food if possible. I will be flying out, so I do not have transportation. I am looking to start full-time ASAP October-December, as the fellowship opportunity I am pursuing does not begin until January. I have applied for my OLCC but have not received it yet. Due to the complexities of the laws regarding professional licensing, I have declined to provide references because I want to keep this work private from my professional network.
